Question.S: In the Amazon Web Services shared responsibility model, which of the following is a responsibility of Amazon?

option2.S: Identity and Access Management

option3.S: Physical Security

option4.S: Server Side Encryption

Question.S: If you have data storage needs where you need to keep your costs low for data that is access infrequently, what service would you choose?

option2.S: S 3

option3.S: Elastic Block Storage

option4.S: Elastic File System

Question.S: If your V P C has public and private subnets, where should you launch your database server?

option2.S: private subnet

option3.S: Neither, create a database only subnet

option4.S: Launch it in its own V P C

Question.S: With the Amazon shared responsibility model, which of the following is not a responsibility of the customer?

option2.S: Operating system, network, and firewall configuration

option3.S: Server side encryption

option4.S: Secure destruction of hard drives

Question.S: In order to perform penetration testing against your services in the A W S Cloud, what what you do?

option1.S: Penetration testing is not allowed at all.  Ever.

option2.S: Obtain approval for penetration testing from A W S ahead of time

option3.S: Perform your penetration testing, but you must inform A W S within 2 hours of starting it

option4.S: Perform your penetration testing, but you must inform A W S within 12 hours of completion

Question.S: You configured an elastic load balancer to perform health checks against two instances running web servers.  What happens if one of those instances fails its health check?

option1.S: The instance is replaced immediate by the elastic load balancer

option2.S: The instance is terminated

option3.S: The instance is quarantined

option4.S: The load balancer will no longer send traffic to the unhealthy instance

Question.S: You want to distribute confidential content using CloudFront.  How can you serve content stored in S3, but not publicly accessibly by S3?

option1.S: Create an Origin Access Identity or O A I for CloudFront and grant access to the objects in your S3 bucket to that O A I

option2.S: Add the CloudFront account security group amazon-cf/amazon-cf-sg to the appropriate S3 bucket policy

option3.S: Create an Identity and Access Management I A M User for CloudFront and grant access to the objects in your S3 bucket to that I A M User

option4.S: Create a S3 bucket policy that lists the CloudFront distribution ID as the Principal and the target bucket as the Amazon Resource Name

Question.S: In the basic monitoring package for E C 2, Amazon CloudWatch provides which of the following metrics?

option1.S: web server visible metrics such as number failed transaction requests

option2.S: operating system visible metrics such as memory utilization

option3.S: operating system visible metrics such as memory utilization

option4.S: hypervisor visible metrics such as C P U utilization

Question.S: What service would you use to create an A W S user and establish policies for rotating passwords?

option2.S: Identity Access Management

option3.S: Directory Service

option4.S: Inspector

Question.S: Which is an operational process performed by AWS for data security?

option1.S: A E S 256 encryption of data stored on any shared storage device

option2.S: Decommissioning of storage devices using industry-standard practices

option3.S: Decommissioning of storage devices using industry-standard practices

option4.S: Replication of data across multiple A W S Regions

Question.S: To protect S3 data from both accidental deletion and accidental overwriting, What should you do?

option1.S: enable S3 versioning on the bucket

option2.S: enable S3 Reduced Redundancy Storage

option3.S: disable S3 delete using an I A M bucket policy

option4.S: enable Multi-Factor Authentication protected access

Question.S: Which of the following A W S not a deployment service?

option2.S: Glacier

option3.S: Elastic Beanstalk

option4.S: cloudformation

Question.S: Which of the following is not a flavor of database offered via Amazon Relational Database Service?

option2.S: PostGres Sequel

option3.S: Oracle

option4.S: Sequel server

Question.S: What service can handle your non-relational database needs?

option2.S: Kinesis

option3.S: Relational Database Service

option4.S: Dynamo D B

Question.S: You want to create an S3 bucket named performance tests in the North Virgia region, but get an error that the bucket name is already taken.  What should you do?

option1.S: Just change your region and try again

option2.S: Bucket names must be globally unique.  If is taken, it is gone.  You need to create a new name.

option3.S: Open a support ticket.  Bucket name collisions can only be handled in this way

option4.S: Reference your bucket by Amazon resource name instead of bucket name.

Question.S: You need to monitor your EC2 instances for things like C P U utilization and memory usage.  Which service can help you?

option2.S: Cloud monitor

option3.S: Cloud watch

option4.S: Cloud watcher

Question.S: You need to change your R D S instance from single availability zone to multi availability zone.  How can you do this?

option2.S: Use the modify option on your R D S instance to make the change from single to multi availability zone

option3.S: Open a help desk ticket.  This is the only way to make such a change to your R D S instance

option4.S: Amazon Relational Database Service does not have a multiple availability zone option

Question.S: In the R D S, what is not an advantage of using a multi availability zone deployment?

option1.S: Much faster performance as you have both a primary and standby instance capable of serving user requests

option2.S: Increased availability for operating system patching as the patch can be applied to the standby instance first, and the only time needed is to allow for the automatic failover to occur

option3.S: Increased availability for taking backups as backups are taken from the standby

option4.S: Automatic failovers. R D S monitors the health of your databases and will automatically failover from primary to standby

Question.S: Which of the following is not a benefit of the multiple A W S regions world wide?

option1.S: using a different region may allow you to lower your costs

option2.S: Geographically disperse regions may help in your compliancy needs addressing what data can flow across borders

option3.S: Faster latency world wide as resources can be placed closer to clients

option4.S: Automatic localization.  You do no need to localize your code as the servers will already be local to the region you are deploying in

Question.S: You are a solutions architect working for a retail company who expects a large amount of traffic to hit its servers immediately after a superbowl commercial airs.  You want to be sure that your elastic load balancer can handle all of the traffic that it will see spike in such a short amount of time.  What can you do?

option1.S: Sit back and relax.  Amazon Elastic Load Balancer is elastic for a reason and can handle any spike in traffic

option2.S: load balance the load balancer.  Create multiple load balancers to handle your traffic needs and place them behind a master elastic load balancer

option3.S: You can contact support and ask them to prewarm your elastic load balancer so it is ready when your anticipated spike in traffic hits

option4.S: The best you can do is use the Elastic Load Balancer to throttle the traffic and configure it to serve a friendly error page when capacity is hit.

Question.S: What does the 53 in Route 53 stand for?

option1.S: 53 is the port used for D N S resolution

option2.S: Route 53 is the 53rd service released by A W S

option3.S: Route 53 is the name of the highway where A W S developers conceptualized the idea

option4.S: 53 represents the limits of resources in a V P C that can use the service

Question.S: What service is Amazons no sequel service?

option2.S: dynamo d b

option3.S: Kinesis

option4.S: redshift

Question.S: You have just made an a p i call to a w s.  What H t t p response code indicated successful completion of your request?
What is glacier designed to accomplish?

option2.S: content delivery

option3.S: secure storage

option4.S: caching

Question.S: An http request is issued to AWS to access data in a CloudFront.  What happens when the request is received by an edge location that does not currently have the resource?

option2.S: The request is cached at the edge location until the object is synchronized to it

option3.S: A request is made to the origin to be served out, but the object is also then cached at the edge location

option4.S: the request is redirected to the closest edge location containing that object
